data.name: Sprout Valley
data.detailed_description:
Sprout Valley is an upcoming farming simulator game where you can step back from the busy life and grow the garden of your dreams. Captivating story, hand-crafted experience.



You play as a main character, cute cat Nico, who tries to find peaceful place to live in.
Nico will find friends along the way and discovers interesting events. Help him to learn what secrets Ostara holds.


The goal will be to gather resources and improve your island life. You can grow the plants and harvest environment for additional resources.



You can sell and buy resources you have gathered. Use your tools to accomplish your goal of living peaceful life with a harmony with the nature.

Levels are procedurally generated, so there is virtually endless combinations. Each level has a "seed" and in future can be shared with other players to recreate island and share them across the player base.



There is dynamic weather system in place to bring some dynamics to the world environment. There will be some additional mechanics that is connected to the weather like ground is getting wet when it rains, etc.



The game has many cool events which tie to weather or the day time.

Key Features


  • Turn your overgrown island into lovely farm! Raise crops, forage fruits, gather resources from the nature.
  • Craft and furnish your island. Make you island your own, personal hideot.
  • Travel to another islands. Sail to another unknown parts of the world. Who knows what adventures await you there!
  • Dialogues and cute story. Meet our cute characters and experience the story together.

data.short_description: Sprout Valley is an upcoming farming simulator game where you can step back from the busy life and grow the garden of your dreams. Captivating story, hand-crafted experience, cute graphics and many more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
